original_text:
For rebellion is as the sin of divination,
    and presumption is as iniquity and idolatry.
Because you have rejected the word of the Lord,
    he has also rejected you from being king.”
korean_text: 이는 거역하는 것은 점치는 죄와 같고 완고한 것은 사신 우상에게 절하는 죄와 같음이라 왕이 여호와의 말씀을 버렸으므로 여호와께서도 왕을 버려 왕이 되지 못하게 하셨나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: For rebellion is as the sin of divination,
and presumption is as iniquity and idolatry.
sentences.korean_translation: 오만은 불법과 우상 숭배와 같기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Because you have rejected the word of the Lord,
he has also rejected you from being king.”
